H0.text: Who wrote the screenplay for the 1994 film ‘Four Weddings and a Funeral’. Richard Curtis

H1.text: Who wrote the screenplay for the 1994 film ‘Four Weddings and a Funeral’. Emma Thompson

H2.text: Who wrote the screenplay for the 1994 film ‘Four Weddings and a Funeral’. Hugh Grant

H3.text: Who wrote the screenplay for the 1994 film ‘Four Weddings and a Funeral’. Rachel Curtis

A4.text: It is the first of several films by screenwriter Richard Curtis to star Hugh Grant.

A5.text: Screenwriter Richard Curtis's own experiences as a wedding attendee inspired Four Weddings and a Funeral.
